metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7943 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The XListFonts function in X.org libX11 before 1.6.4 might allow remote Xservers to gain privileges via vectors involving length fields, whichtrigger out-of-bounds write operations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7943` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
libx11-data - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libx11 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1').
